About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

Harpist, music teacher, instrument technician, plant mom

Performance Experience

I have been playing harp professionally since 2005. My experience includes playing for the Alton Illinois Symphony, the Town and Country Missouri Symphony, the Fox Theatre St. Louis as well as many individual engagements.

Regulation Experience

I have been regulating harps professionally since 2020.

Education

Batchelor degree Music University of Missouri St. Louis 2014. Lyon and Healy Harp Regulation Apprentice Program 2020.

I have been teaching harp since 2010.
